"About Weapon Boost":
"This explains the \"Weapon Boost\" Title feature.

As you gather rare 7★-12★ weapons,
you will earn Weapons Library Registration titles
corresponding to each class.
When you collect the reward for these,
you will also be granted a \"Weapon Boost\".

These boosts permanently increase damage dealt
by your main class's equippable weapons.
In the case of Hunter, Swords, Partizans,
Wired Lances, and Gunslashes will benefit.

What's more, each Weapon Boost you earn
will apply to all characters on a single account."
